remarks: The value of isomorphism H is a set of vectors.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihss.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihss.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihss.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihss.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihss $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( I ` X ) C_ V ) $.
